segments.transcript_am: ቀይ ባሕር በሚመለከት
segments.transcript_en: Regarding the Red Sea,

segments.transcript_am: ቀይ ባሕር በሚመለከት መላው የኢትዮጵያ ህዝብ የተከበረው ምክር ቤት
segments.transcript_en: Regarding the Red Sea, the entire Ethiopian people, the honorable House,

segments.transcript_am: እኛ የቀይ ባሕር ጉዳይ ሕጋዊ ታሪካዊ መልከአ ምድራዊ እና ኢኮኖሚያዊ ጥያቄ ነው ብለን እናምናለን።
segments.transcript_en: We believe that the issue of the Red Sea is a legal, historical, geographical, and economic question.

segments.transcript_am: ይሄ ጥያቄ አንዳንዱ ነገ ካልተመለሰ ይላል።
segments.transcript_en: Some say this question must be answered tomorrow.

segments.transcript_am: አንዳንዱ ነገ እኔ ስመጣ ካልጀመርኩት ይላል።
segments.transcript_en: Some say, 'If I don't start it the moment I come [to power]'.

segments.transcript_am: ሁለቱም አያስፈልግም።
segments.transcript_en: Both are unnecessary.

segments.transcript_am: ቀይ ባሕርን ኢትዮጵያ ለማጣት
segments.transcript_en: For Ethiopia to lose the Red Sea,

segments.transcript_am: 30 ዓመት ከዚያ በላይ
segments.transcript_en: it took 30 years or more.

segments.transcript_am: የወሰደ ትግል ነበር። ታቃላችሁ በ30 ዓመት ትግል ውስጥ በብዙዎች ርብርብ ነው ኢትዮጵያ ያጣችው። ሌላ 30 ዓመት
segments.transcript_en: It was a struggle that took time. You know, Ethiopia lost it through a 30-year struggle and the effort of many. Another 30 years

segments.transcript_am: ያስፈልጋታል ብዬ ግን አላስብም።
segments.transcript_en: I don't think she needs.

segments.transcript_am: በተረጋጋ መንገድ በሰክነ መንገድ በውይይት መሄድ በጣም አስፈላጊ ነው።
segments.transcript_en: It is very important to proceed in a calm manner, in a sober manner, and through dialogue.

segments.transcript_am: የፈለገ ብንወያይ ግን ለማጣት የፈጀብን 30 ዓመት ለማግኘት ይፈጅብናል ብዬ ግን አላስብም።
segments.transcript_en: However much we discuss, I don't think it will take us 30 years to get it, which is the time it took to lose it.

segments.transcript_am: ጊዜውም በቂ ስለሆነ በተረጋጋ መንገድ ማየት ያስፈልጋል።
segments.transcript_en: Since there is enough time, it is necessary to look at it calmly.

segments.transcript_am: ምክር ቤት የኢትዮጵያ ሕዝብ እንዲያይ የምፈልገው ግን ጥያቄው ስናነሳ አንዳንዱ ሾርት ስለሆነ ሚሞሪው
segments.transcript_en: House, what I want the Ethiopian people to see is, when we raise the question, because some have short memories,

segments.transcript_am: ዛሬን ብቻ ስለሚያስብ ትንሽ ዳራው ልስጣችሁ። መጀመሪያ ኢትዮጵያን የቀይ ባሕር አክስስ ያሳጣው ውሳኔ ማን ወሰነው?
segments.transcript_en: and think only of today, let me give you a little background. Who made the decision that first deprived Ethiopia of Red Sea access?

segments.transcript_am: ካብኔው አያውቀውም። አይ የለም ምክር ቤት ይሆናል የወሰነው
segments.transcript_en: The Cabinet didn't know it. [If we say] 'No, maybe the Parliament decided it',

segments.transcript_am: ብለን ብንወስን ምክር ቤቱም አልነበረም። ምክር ቤት አያውቀውም ውሳኔው።
segments.transcript_en: if we assume that, the Parliament wasn't even there. The Parliament didn't know the decision.

segments.transcript_am: ያኔ የኢትዮጵያ ህዝብ ያልወሰነው ተወካዮቹ ያላዩት ቢያንስ ቢያንስ ከአስፈጻሚ ካብኔ ያላየው ውሳኔ ማን ወሰነው?
segments.transcript_en: Back then, who made the decision that the Ethiopian people didn't decide on, their representatives didn't see, and at least the executive cabinet didn't see?

segments.transcript_am: ካብኔው አያውቀውም።
segments.transcript_en: The cabinet didn't know it.

segments.transcript_am: አንድ ገፅ ወረቀት ማግኘት አልቻልንም። እንዴት እንዳጣነው የሚያስረዳ
segments.transcript_en: We couldn't find a single page of paper explaining how we lost it.

segments.transcript_am: እና ህዝብ የማያውቀው ፓርላማ የማያውቀው ካብኔ የማያውቀው
segments.transcript_en: So, regarding a decision the people didn't know, the parliament didn't know, the cabinet didn't know,

segments.transcript_am: የኢትዮጵያ የባሕር አክሰስ ውሳኔ የሚያሳጣ ነገር የወሰነው ማነው የሚል ጥያቄ ማንሳት እንዴት ስሕተት ሊሆን ይችላል?
segments.transcript_en: how can it be a mistake to raise the question 'who decided the thing that deprives Ethiopia of sea access'?

segments.transcript_am: ካለ ይነገረን።
segments.transcript_en: If there is [proof], let us be told.

segments.transcript_am: ከሌለ ግን ይሄ ጉዳይ ይሄኑ አንስቶ እንደመልፋት አይደለም።
segments.transcript_en: But if not, raising this issue is not just for the sake of tiring ourselves out.

segments.transcript_am: ይሄ ነው ጥያቄው።
segments.transcript_en: This is the question.

segments.transcript_am: እዚህ ጋር ሁለት ችግሮች አሉ።
segments.transcript_en: There are two problems here.

segments.transcript_am: አንደኛው የተዛባ ትርክት ውጤት ነው።
segments.transcript_en: The first is the result of a distorted narrative.

segments.transcript_am: የሚገባኑ መጠየቅ ነውር አድርጎ የሚያስብ
segments.transcript_en: The mindset that thinks it is shameful to ask for what we deserve,

segments.transcript_am: የሚገባንን ማንሳት ትክክል አይደለም ብሎ የሚያስብ እሳቤ እሄ ደግሞ የትርክት ውጤት ነው። ግን ለናንተ ለማስታወስ እንዲሆናችሁ
segments.transcript_en: thinking that raising what we deserve is incorrect, is the result of that narrative. But just to remind you,

segments.transcript_am: ከግጭቱ በኋላ በኢትዮጵያ እና ኤርትራ መካከል ሰላም ሲፈጠር
segments.transcript_en: after the conflict, when peace was established between Ethiopia and Eritrea,

segments.transcript_am: እሳቸው ባሉበት
segments.transcript_en: while he [President Isaias] was present,

segments.transcript_am: ለሕዝብ በሚገባው ልክ
segments.transcript_en: to the extent the people deserve,

segments.transcript_am: ደስታችሁን ለማስታወስ ብቻ ነው።
segments.transcript_en: it is just to remind you of your joy.

segments.transcript_am: ኤርትራ ስመላለስ አስመራን ካየሁ በኋላ ከክቡር ፕሬዝዳንቱ ጋራ አሰብ መሄድ እፈልጋለሁ ብዬ አሰብ ሂጄ ነበረ።
segments.transcript_en: When I was traveling to Eritrea, after seeing Asmara, I said I wanted to go to Assab with the honorable President, and I went to Assab.

segments.transcript_am: አሰብ ባሕሩ ቆመን ያውራነው ምንድን ነው።
segments.transcript_en: What did we talk about standing by the Assab sea?

segments.transcript_am: ሶስተኛ የመደመር ትውልድ መጽሐፍ ላይ በግልጽ
segments.transcript_en: Thirdly, in the 'Medemer Generation' book, clearly,

segments.transcript_am: ጂኦ ፖለቲክስስ አስፍሬ የአሰብ ጉዳይ አስቀምጬ ለኤርትራ ባለስልጣናት በስጦታ ልኬላቸዋለው። ሚስጥር እኮ አይደለም። ያውቁታል።
segments.transcript_en: I noted the geopolitics, stated the Assab issue, and sent it as a gift to the Eritrean officials. It is not a secret. They know it.

segments.transcript_am: ለሁሉም ልኬላቸዋለው።
segments.transcript_en: I sent it to all of them.

segments.transcript_am: አራተኛ እናንተ እምታውቁት የዛሬ 6 ዓመት 5 ዓመት ባሕር ሃይል አቋቁመናል።
segments.transcript_en: Fourth, as you know, we established a Navy 5 or 6 years ago.

segments.transcript_am: እናም እዚህ ውስጥ ነው ባሕር ሃይሉ የሚመቆመው?
segments.transcript_en: So, is the Navy going to be established inside here [landlocked]?

segments.transcript_am: ለምን ሰዎች
segments.transcript_en: Why people

segments.transcript_am: ይሄን ደምረው ማየት እንደሚቸገሩ አይገባኝም። ኢትዮጵያ ቀይ ባሕር እንደሚያስፈልጋት ከለውጡ በፊትም እናምን ነበር። እንናገር ነበር። ያኔ መደመጥ አንችልም። ከጀመርንበት ቀን አንስቶ ግን ንግግሩ አለ። ያ ንግግር ግን ሰላማዊ መሆን አለበት።
segments.transcript_en: I don't understand why people have trouble adding this up and seeing it. We believed Ethiopia needs the Red Sea even before the reform. We used to say it. We couldn't be heard back then. But since the day we started, the conversation exists. But that conversation must be peaceful.

segments.transcript_am: የተከበሩ እንዳነሱት ከኤርትራ መንግሥት ጋር ተስማምተን ከዚህ ወደ አሰብ የሚሄደው መንገድ ጠግነናል እኮ እኮ።
segments.transcript_en: As the honorable [member] raised, we agreed with the Eritrean government and repaired the road going from here to Assab.

segments.transcript_am: ከጠገንን በኋላ
segments.transcript_en: After we repaired it,

segments.transcript_am: ችግር አለብን። ፖርቱ ተዳክሟል አሉ።
segments.transcript_en: we had a problem. They said the port is weakened.

segments.transcript_am: አሁን አንዳንዶች ልክ ፀቡ እንደው ወቨር ናይት የመጣ የሚመስለው ሰው አለ። እንደዛ አይደለም። ታሪኩ ስለማንናገረው ነው። መንገድ ጠግነን ከጨረስን በኋላ ፖርቱ ችግር አለበት ሲሉ የጋራ ወዳጅ የሆነ ሀገር ለምነን
segments.transcript_en: Now some people think the conflict came overnight. It is not like that. It is because we don't tell the history. After we finished repairing the road, when they said the port has a problem, we begged a country that is a mutual friend,

segments.transcript_am: በእርዳታ ወደ ኤርትራ እንዲመጣ አድርገን አሰብ ፖርት ሲደርስ የኤርትራ መንግሥት አልፈልግም ብሎ መለሰ።
segments.transcript_en: we arranged for aid to come to Eritrea, but when it reached Assab port, the Eritrean government said 'I don't want it' and returned it.

segments.transcript_am: ያኔ ነው የገባን። ለካ ይሄ ነገር ተስፋ የለውም አልን።
segments.transcript_en: That is when we understood. We said, 'So, this thing has no hope'.

segments.transcript_am: መንገድ ጠገንን
segments.transcript_en: We repaired the road,

segments.transcript_am: ለምነን ብናመጣም ፍላጎት አልነበረም። ወደ ኤርትራ ልክ እንደ ሱዳን ልክ እንደ ጅቡቲ በእኛ ውጪ ፓዎር ትራንስሚሽን ቀጥለን ፓወር እንስጣችሁ። ጀነሬተር አትጠቀሙ ብለንም ቆይ እናስብበት ነው የተባለው።
segments.transcript_en: Even when we begged and brought [aid], there was no interest. We said, let us connect power transmission to Eritrea just like Sudan and Djibouti and give you power; don't use generators. We were told 'wait, let us think about it'.

segments.transcript_am: አሰብ ስሄድ
segments.transcript_en: When I went to Assab,

segments.transcript_am: ዋን ፖይንት ፋይቭ ሚልዮን ኴክ መገንባት አለብን ብያቸዋለው። አሰብ ስሄድ ቤት አለ። በር አለ። ሰው የለም።
segments.transcript_en: I told them we must build a 1.5 million [capacity] quay. When I went to Assab, there are houses. There are doors. There are no people.

segments.transcript_am: ይሄ እውነተኛ ታሪክ ነው።
segments.transcript_en: This is a true story.

segments.transcript_am: ይሄንን ከተማ መልሰን ሕይወት እንስጠው። ሥራ ነው የሚያመጣለት።
segments.transcript_en: Let us give life back to this city. It brings jobs for it.

segments.transcript_am: የሚል በየጊዜው ተነጋግረናል። ሁሉም ኢንቮይ የሚሄደው ተወያይቶበታል። በኤርትራ በኩል።
segments.transcript_en: We discussed this periodically. Every envoy that goes has discussed it. On the side of Eritrea,

segments.transcript_am: ልግልጽ ባላወቅነው መንገድ
segments.transcript_en: in a way we clearly didn't understand,

segments.transcript_am: አሁን አደለም። እናንተ ችግር እንዳለ ሳትሰሙ ነው የተዘጉት።
segments.transcript_en: It is not now. You were shut out without hearing that there was a problem.

segments.transcript_am: እና የኤርትራ ሕዝብ አሁንም ወንድም ሕዝብ ነው።
segments.transcript_en: And the Eritrean people are still a brotherly people.

segments.transcript_am: ከዚህ ህዝብ ጋር በጋራ መስራት መተባበር ፍላጎታችን ነው። በፍጹም የውግያ መሻት የለንም።
segments.transcript_en: It is our desire to work together and cooperate with this people. We have absolutely no desire for combat.

segments.transcript_am: በህጋዊ እና ንግግር ሊፈታ ይችላል ነው። ለብዙ ሀገራት
segments.transcript_en: It can be solved lawfully and through dialogue. To many countries,

segments.transcript_am: በተናጠል ተናገሬያለው። ምክር ቤት መስማት ከፈለገ ግን ለአሜሪካ ለቻይና ለራሽያ ለአውሮፓ ለአፍሪካ አሁን በተከበረ ምክር ቤት መናገር የምፈልግው ነገር የኢትዮጵያ የቀይ ባሕር አክሰስ ጉዳይ አይቀሬ ስለሆነ
segments.transcript_en: I have spoken individually. But if the House wants to hear, I want to tell America, China, Russia, Europe, Africa, in the honorable House, that since the issue of Ethiopia's Red Sea access is inevitable,

segments.transcript_am: እባካችሁን ሸንግሉን እና መፍትሐ አምጡልን።
segments.transcript_en: please mediate for us and bring us a solution.

segments.transcript_am: አዎን እንሸመግላችሁዋለን። ሰላም ያስፈልጋል እያሉ ማዘናጋት ከሆነ ግን
segments.transcript_en: If it is saying 'Yes, we will mediate', saying 'peace is necessary' just to distract us,

segments.transcript_am: አይመስለኝም።
segments.transcript_en: I don't think so.

segments.transcript_am: በአንድ ቀንም አንመልሰውም።
segments.transcript_en: We won't resolve it in one day either.

segments.transcript_am: ናቹራል ሂደቱን ተከትሎ ይሄዳል። እዛው ላይ ጥያቄ የተነሳው
segments.transcript_en: It will follow its natural process. The question raised there,

segments.transcript_am: የውስጥ አጀንዳ እንዳይበርድ ለማድረግ ነው ያሉት የተከበሩት በእርግጥ ይሄን ነገር ከኤርትራውያን ሰምተናል። ብዙ ግዜ ነግረውናል። ለምን ምክር ቤት እንደመጣ አላውቅኩም። እንጂ ኤርትራውያን ይሄ ጉዳይ የሚነሳ ያለው የውስጥ ጉዳያቸው እንዳይበርድ ለማድረግ ነው ብለውናል።
segments.transcript_en: The honorable member said it is to prevent internal agendas from cooling down. Indeed, we have heard this from Eritreans. They have told us many times. I don't know why it came to the House. But Eritreans have told us that this issue is being raised to prevent their internal affairs from cooling down.

segments.transcript_am: ምንም ዳይቨርት የሚደረግ አጀንዳ የለም። የህዝብ መንግስት ነው ያለው። ለህዝብ የሚሰራ መንግስትነው ያለው። ውጤት እያመጣ ያለ መንግስት ነው ያለው። በብዙ አፍሪካ ወንድሞቻችን የሚቀናበት መንግስት ነው ያለው።
segments.transcript_en: There is no agenda being diverted. There is a people's government. A government working for the people. A government that is bringing results. A government that many of our African brothers envy.
